glsa.title: Wireshark: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Wireshark could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer formerly known as ethereal.

description.p: A double free error was discovered in Wiresharkâ€™s Kafka dissector.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities by sending a malformed packet or enticing a user to read a malformed packet trace file, causing a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Wireshark users should upgrade to the latest version:
